verses.1:
Manapa-kevitra aho izao (in-2)
Hanarak'an'i Jesosy aho
Ka tsy hiverin-dalana.
verses.2:
Any ivohok'izao tontolo izao (in-2)
Fa Jesosy no eo alohako
Ka tsy hiverin-dalana.
verses.3:
Na dia tsy misy ho namako, aza (in-2)
Hanaraka Azy ihany aho
Ka tsy hiverin-dalana.
verses.4:
Mba tapa-kevitra ve ianao (in-2)
Hanaraka an'i Jesosy izao
Ka tsy hiverin-dalana.
